content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Cultural presentation (Selection plays one time.)
content.question: What is one of the points made by the presenter?

choices.label: Eating sushi by hand is permitted.
Customers often request extra soy sauce.

content.answer: Eating sushi by hand is permitted.

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
